00054 #ifndef SCFX_IEEE_H
00055 #define SCFX_IEEE_H

00064 // classes defined in this module
00065 union ieee_double;
00066 class scfx_ieee_double;
00067 union ieee_float;
00068 class scfx_ieee_float;
00069 
00070 #define SCFX_MASK_(Size) \
00071    ((1u << (Size))-1u)
00072 
00073 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 //  UNION : ieee_double
00075 //
00076 //  IEEE 754 double-precision format.
00077 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 
00079 union ieee_double
00080 {
00081 
00082     double d;
00083 
00084     struct
00085     {
00086 #if defined( SC_BIG_ENDIAN )
00087         unsigned negative:1;
00088         unsigned exponent:11;
00089         unsigned mantissa0:20;
00090         unsigned mantissa1:32;
00091 #elif defined( SC_LITTLE_ENDIAN )
00092         unsigned mantissa1:32;
00093         unsigned mantissa0:20;
00094         unsigned exponent:11;
00095         unsigned negative:1;
00096 #endif
00097     } s;
00098 
00099 };
00100 
00101 
00102 const unsigned int SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_BIAS   =  1023U;
00103 
00104 const int          SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_MAX  =  1023;
00105 const int          SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_MIN  = -1022;
00106 
00107 const unsigned int SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_M_SIZE  =    52;
00108 const unsigned int SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_M0_SIZE =    20;
00109 const unsigned int SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_M1_SIZE =    32;
00110 const unsigned int SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_SIZE  =    11;
00111 
00112 
00113 
00114 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00115 //  CLASS : scfx_ieee_double
00116 //
00117 //  Convenient interface to union ieee_double.
00118 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 
00120 class SC_API scfx_ieee_double
00121 {
00122 
00123     ieee_double m_id;
00124 
00125 public:
00126     
00127     scfx_ieee_double();
00128     scfx_ieee_double( double );
00129     scfx_ieee_double( const scfx_ieee_double& );
00130     
00131     scfx_ieee_double& operator = ( double );
00132     scfx_ieee_double& operator = ( const scfx_ieee_double& );
00133     
00134     operator double() const;
00135 
00136     unsigned int negative() const;
00137     void negative( unsigned int );
00138     int exponent() const;
00139     void exponent( int );
00140     unsigned int mantissa0() const;
00141     void mantissa0( unsigned int );
00142     unsigned int mantissa1() const;
00143     void mantissa1( unsigned int );
00144 
00145     bool is_zero() const;
00146     bool is_subnormal() const;
00147     bool is_normal() const;
00148     bool is_inf() const;
00149     bool is_nan() const;
00150 
00151     void set_inf();
00152     void set_nan();
00153 
00154     int msb() const;            // most significant non-zero bit
00155     int lsb() const;            // least significant non-zero bit
00156 
00157     static const scfx_ieee_double nan();
00158     static const scfx_ieee_double inf( int );
00159 
00160 };

00216 void
00217 scfx_ieee_double::negative( unsigned int a )
00218 {

00220 }

00222 inline
00223 int
00224 scfx_ieee_double::exponent() const
00225 {
00226     return m_id.s.exponent - SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_BIAS;
00227 }
00228

00230 void
00231 scfx_ieee_double::exponent( int a )
00232 {
00233     m_id.s.exponent = (SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_BIAS + a)
00234                       & SCFX_MASK_(SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_SIZE);
00235 }
00236

00239 scfx_ieee_double::mantissa0() const

00241     return m_id.s.mantissa0;
00242 }

00246 scfx_ieee_double::mantissa0( unsigned int a )
00247 {

00249 }
00250

00252 unsigned int
00253 scfx_ieee_double::mantissa1() const
00254 {
00255     return m_id.s.mantissa1;
00256 }

00259 void
00260 scfx_ieee_double::mantissa1( unsigned int a )
00261 {
00262     m_id.s.mantissa1 = a; // & SCFX_MASK_(SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_M1_SIZE);
00263 }
00264 
00265 
00266 inline
00267 bool
00268 scfx_ieee_double::is_zero() const
00269 {
00270     return ( exponent() == SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_MIN - 1 &&
00271              mantissa0() == 0U && mantissa1() == 0U );
00272 }
00273 
00274 inline
00275 bool
00276 scfx_ieee_double::is_subnormal() const
00277 {
00278     return ( exponent() == SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_MIN - 1 &&
00279              ( mantissa0() != 0U || mantissa1() != 0U ) );
00280 }
00281 
00282 inline
00283 bool
00284 scfx_ieee_double::is_normal() const
00285 {
00286     return ( exponent() >= SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_MIN &&
00287              exponent() <= SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_MAX );
00288 }
00289 
00290 inline
00291 bool
00292 scfx_ieee_double::is_inf() const
00293 {
00294     return ( exponent() == SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_MAX + 1 &&
00295              mantissa0() == 0U && mantissa1() == 0U );
00296 }
00297 
00298 inline
00299 bool
00300 scfx_ieee_double::is_nan() const
00301 {
00302     return ( exponent() == SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_MAX + 1 &&
00303              ( mantissa0() != 0U || mantissa1() != 0U ) );
00304 }
00305 
00306 
00307 inline
00308 void
00309 scfx_ieee_double::set_inf()
00310 {
00311     exponent( SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_MAX + 1 );
00312     mantissa0( 0U );
00313     mantissa1( 0U );
00314 }
00315 
00316 inline
00317 void
00318 scfx_ieee_double::set_nan()
00319 {
00320     exponent( SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_MAX + 1 );
00321     mantissa0( (unsigned int) -1 );
00322     mantissa1( (unsigned int) -1 );
00323 }
00324 
00325 
00326 #define MSB_STATEMENT(x,n) if( x >> n ) { x >>= n; i += n; }
00327 
00328 inline
00329 int
00330 scfx_ieee_double::msb() const
00331 {
00332     unsigned int m0 = mantissa0();
00333     unsigned int m1 = mantissa1();
00334     if( m0 != 0 )
00335     {
00336         int i = 0;
00337         MSB_STATEMENT(m0,16);
00338         MSB_STATEMENT(m0,8);
00339         MSB_STATEMENT(m0,4);
00340         MSB_STATEMENT(m0,2);
00341         MSB_STATEMENT(m0,1);
00342         return ( i - 20 );
00343     }
00344     else if( m1 != 0 )
00345     {
00346         int i = 0;
00347         MSB_STATEMENT(m1,16);
00348         MSB_STATEMENT(m1,8);
00349         MSB_STATEMENT(m1,4);
00350         MSB_STATEMENT(m1,2);
00351         MSB_STATEMENT(m1,1);
00352         return ( i - 52 );
00353     }
00354     else
00355     {
00356         return 0;
00357     }
00358 }
00359 
00360 #undef MSB_STATEMENT
00361 
00362 #define LSB_STATEMENT(x,n) if( x << n ) { x <<= n; i -= n; }
00363 
00364 inline
00365 int
00366 scfx_ieee_double::lsb() const
00367 {
00368     unsigned int m0 = mantissa0();
00369     unsigned int m1 = mantissa1();
00370     if( m1 != 0 )
00371     {
00372         int i = 31;
00373         LSB_STATEMENT(m1,16);
00374         LSB_STATEMENT(m1,8);
00375         LSB_STATEMENT(m1,4);
00376         LSB_STATEMENT(m1,2);
00377         LSB_STATEMENT(m1,1);
00378         return ( i - 52 );
00379     }
00380     else if( m0 != 0 )
00381     {
00382         int i = 31;
00383         LSB_STATEMENT(m0,16);
00384         LSB_STATEMENT(m0,8);
00385         LSB_STATEMENT(m0,4);
00386         LSB_STATEMENT(m0,2);
00387         LSB_STATEMENT(m0,1);
00388         return ( i - 20 );
00389     }
00390     else
00391     {
00392         return 0;
00393     }
00394 }
00395 
00396 #undef LSB_STATEMENT
00397 
00398 
00399 inline
00400 const scfx_ieee_double
00401 scfx_ieee_double::nan()
00402 {
00403     scfx_ieee_double id;
00404     id.set_nan();
00405     return id;
00406 }
00407 
00408 inline
00409 const scfx_ieee_double
00410 scfx_ieee_double::inf( int sign )
00411 {
00412     scfx_ieee_double id( sign );
00413     id.set_inf();
00414     return id;
00415 }

00418 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00419 //  UNION : ieee_float
00420 //
00421 //  IEEE 754 single-precision format.
00422 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00423     
00424 union ieee_float
00425 {
00426 
00427     float f;
00428 
00429     struct
00430     {
00431 #if defined( SC_BIG_ENDIAN )
00432         unsigned negative:1;
00433         unsigned exponent:8;
00434         unsigned mantissa:23;
00435 #elif defined( SC_LITTLE_ENDIAN )
00436         unsigned mantissa:23;
00437         unsigned exponent:8;
00438         unsigned negative:1;
00439 #endif
00440     } s;
00441 
00442 };
00443 
00444 
00445 const unsigned int SCFX_IEEE_FLOAT_BIAS   =  127U;
00446 
00447 const int          SCFX_IEEE_FLOAT_E_MAX  =  127;
00448 const int          SCFX_IEEE_FLOAT_E_MIN  = -126;
00449 
00450 const unsigned int SCFX_IEEE_FLOAT_M_SIZE =   23;
00451 const unsigned int SCFX_IEEE_FLOAT_E_SIZE =    8;
00452 
00453 
00454 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00455 //  CLASS : scfx_ieee_float
00456 //
00457 // Convenient wrapper to union ieee_float.
00458 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00459 
00460 class SC_API scfx_ieee_float
00461 {
00462 
00463     ieee_float m_if;
00464 
00465 public:
00466 
00467     scfx_ieee_float();
00468     scfx_ieee_float( float );
00469     scfx_ieee_float( const scfx_ieee_float& );
00470 
00471     scfx_ieee_float& operator = ( float );
00472     scfx_ieee_float& operator = ( const scfx_ieee_float& );
00473 
00474     operator float() const;
00475 
00476     unsigned int negative() const;
00477     void negative( unsigned int );
00478     int exponent() const;
00479     void exponent( int );
00480     unsigned int mantissa() const;
00481     void mantissa( unsigned int );
00482 
00483     bool is_zero() const;
00484     bool is_subnormal() const;
00485     bool is_normal() const;
00486     bool is_inf() const;
00487     bool is_nan() const;
00488 
00489     void set_inf();
00490     void set_nan();
00491 
00492 };

00611 }
00612

00614 bool

00618 }

00625     exponent( SCFX_IEEE_FLOAT_E_MAX + 1 );
00626     mantissa( 0U );
00627 }
00628 
00629 inline
00630 void
00631 scfx_ieee_float::set_nan()
00632 {
00633     exponent( SCFX_IEEE_FLOAT_E_MAX + 1 );
00634     mantissa( (unsigned int) -1 );
00635 }

00637 
00638 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00639 //  FUNCTION : scfx_pow2
00640 //
00641 //  Computes 2.0**exp in double-precision.
00642 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00643 
00644 inline
00645 double scfx_pow2( int exp )
00646 {
00647     scfx_ieee_double r;
00648     if( exp < SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_MIN )
00649     {
00650         r = 0.0;
00651         // handle subnormal case
00652         exp -= SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_MIN;
00653         if( ( exp += 20 ) >= 0 )
00654         {
00655             r.mantissa0( 1U << exp );
00656         }
00657         else if( ( exp += 32 ) >= 0 )
00658         {
00659             r.mantissa1( 1U << exp );
00660         }
00661     }
00662     else if( exp > SCFX_IEEE_DOUBLE_E_MAX )
00663     {
00664         r.set_inf();
00665     }
00666     else
00667     {
00668         r = 1.0;
00669         r.exponent( exp );
00670     }
00671     return r;
00672 }
00673 
00674 
00675 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00676 //  FUNCTION : uint64_to_double
00677 //
00678 //  Platform independent conversion from double uint64 to double.
00679 //  Needed because VC++6 doesn't support this conversion.
00680 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00681 
00682 inline
00683 double
00684 uint64_to_double( uint64 a )
00685 {
00686 #if defined( _MSC_VER ) || defined( __clang__ )
00687     // conversion from uint64 to double not implemented; use int64
00688     double tmp = static_cast<double>( static_cast<int64>( a ) );
00689     return ( tmp >= 0 ) ? tmp : tmp + sc_dt::scfx_pow2( 64 );
00690 #else
00691     return static_cast<double>( a );
00692 #endif
00693 }
00694

00698 
00699 #endif
